prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This holding was an archival transfer on September 19, 1988.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter to [Henry Carey?] Baird, Henry Charles Carey deals with the confusion of a billing discrepancy on some tracts printed by Carey and asks for a detailed bill.
